Posts.Content: hi i am 25 i had a long hard battle with tripple positive breast cancer stage three in my left breast had doubble mesectomy with full removal of lymph nodes under left arm and now i just had a biopsy of the lymph nodes in my neck scared to death of reccurence  cause my chemotherpy gave me sever side effects of neuropathy in my legs, a little in my hands     So question is  Is there anyone out there my age that is where i am in life ever if your not my age help   any reply would be greatful
Posts.Title: breast cancer re currence
